title: Chris Christie on GOP Future After Trump
itunes:title: Chris Christie on GOP Future After Trump
description:
Former New Jersey Governor Chris Christie discusses the importance of wearing a mask, the consequences for President Trump and his supporters after inciting the attack on the U.S. Capitol, and the future of the Republican Party after President Trump leaves office.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
